Package game.interfaces

Interface Resettable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Aldrich, Chest, EstusFlask, Mimic, Player, Skeleton, StormRuler, Undead, Yhorm
public interface Resettable
Interface for game objects that should be reset

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean isExist()
    A useful method to clean up the list of instances in the ResetManager class
    default void registerInstance()
    a default interface method that register current instance to the Singleton manager.
    void resetInstance​(GameMap map)
    Allows any classes that use this interface to reset abilities, attributes, and items.

  • Method Details

    • resetInstance

      void resetInstance​(GameMap map)
      Allows any classes that use this interface to reset abilities, attributes, and items.
      Parameters:
      map - the game map.

    • isExist

      boolean isExist()
      A useful method to clean up the list of instances in the ResetManager class
      Returns:
      the existence of the instance in the game. for example, true to keep it permanent, or false if instance needs to be removed from the reset list.

    • registerInstance

      default void registerInstance()
      a default interface method that register current instance to the Singleton manager.
